text: Andreyevka () is a rural locality (a village) in Novokarmalinsky Selsoviet, Miyakinsky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 9 as of 2010. There is 1 street. == Geography == It is located 10 km from Kirgiz-Miyaki, 8 km from Novyye Karmaly. == References == Category:Rural localities in Miyakinsky District
title: Andreyevka, Miyakinsky District, Republic of Bashkortostan
